chunk: Pineapple slices with plain yoghurt recipe Introduce your baby to juicy pineapple slices, served with plain full-fat yoghurt. A great snack for older children in the family too. Age: 6 months or older Prep: 2 mins Portions: 1 Ingredients - 1 small tin pineapple slices (in juice) - 1 tbsp plain full fat yoghurt (optional) Method Open the tinned pineapple, drain juice and put one pineapple ring in a bowl. Cut the pineapple ring in half so it's easier for your baby to pick up. Add the yoghurt to the bowl and serve. Information: You can use fresh or tinned pineapple. If using tinned fruit, remember to choose juice rather than syrup.
title: Pineapple Slices With Plain Yoghurt
description: Introduce your baby to juicy pineapple slices, served with plain full-fat yoghurt. A great snack for older children in the family too.
